reviewtext: I love this little radio. I wanted something simple and easy and small so that I could listen at bedtime. I am an AM Radio fan. It really is perfect. If you choose to buy headphones or ear phones for this radio, buy a simple one because I purchased a Panasonic earphone set for IPod and the sound comes out of one ear speaker using this radio. That does not happen using it with any other music source. I know it's the radio. Simple radio, needs a simple ear phone.
summary: A very cool little classic radio
